# AXDataPointValue

**Class**

A single data value.

## Declaration

```swift
class AXDataPointValue
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXDataPointValue] can be either numeric or categorical. Data points in a numeric axis use the [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXDataPointValue/number] property, and data points in a categorical axis use the [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXDataPointValue/category] property.

## Specifying the data value

- **xValue**: The value of the x-axis for the data point.
- **yValue**: The value of the y-axis for the data point.
- **AXDataPoint.Value**: Constants that describe types of data values.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
